Class FacultyServiceSpringImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.co.sunrays.proj0.service.FacultyServiceSpringImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FacultyServiceInt

    @Service(value="facultyService")
public class FacultyServiceSpringImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FacultyServiceInt
    Session facade of Faculty Service. It is transactional, apply delcarative transactions with help of Spring AOP. If unchecked exception is propagated from a method then transaction will be rolled back. Default propogation value is Propagation.REQUIRED and readOnly = false
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Session Facade
